entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:01 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 10:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain overnight. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
